blendWithAnotherStyle.title: Blend With Another Style?
blendWithAnotherStyle.note: Optional. Useful for mixing styles, or using masks to apply different styles to different parts of the image. Styles you add this way will be used together in the same creation.

creationSettings.title: Creation Settings
creationSettings.note: These options affect the creation as a whole.
